testcase.name: Activity Creation in Pro Acc Application
testcase.system-out: Given User should be navigate to Activity page..............................passed When User has to click on Add Activity button...............................passed And User has to fill the fields like Task,ApplicationArea,Phase,Role,BuildingBlock,Est Hrs.passed And User has to click on save button for creating new activity..............passed Then User can verify the created activity in the search list................passed
